function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation due to uncomplimentary climatic circumstances, limiting the ability to keep windows and doors open","Impact":"Compromised air movement leading to increased risk of disease transmission, including coronavirus and other viruses","Mitigation":"Implementation of mechanical ventilation systems to ensure efficient air circulation and filtration","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air purifiers, HEPA filters","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Prevalence of pathogen persistence due to modern architectural practices favoring aesthetics and comforts","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen transmission and persistence in healthcare and built environments","Mitigation":"Integration of antimicrobial materials, easy-to-clean surfaces, and regular disinfection protocols in designs","Technologies":"Antimicrobial materials, efficient cleaning solutions, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases, including the coronavirus, due to inadequate design adaptation to new challenges","Impact":"Increased risk of disease outbreaks and difficulty in containing epidemics within healthcare and built environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of flexible and adaptable designs that can quickly react to new challenges, including the coronavirus epidemic","Technologies":"Modular construction, adaptable room layouts, flexible HVAC systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, healthcare facility management"}]}
